mapper.insert: insert into CameraEquipment (ID, StationID, DeviceName, DeviceType, IP, Port, Channel, ServerPort, UserName, UserPassword, nChannelID) values (#{ID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stationID,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{deviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{IP,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{port,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channel,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{serverPort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nChannelID,jdbcType=NVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update CameraEquipment set StationID = #{stationID,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, DeviceName = #{deviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DeviceType = #{deviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IP = #{IP,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Port = #{port,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Channel = #{channel,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, ServerPort = #{serverPort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UserName = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UserPassword = #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nChannelID = #{nChannelID,jdbcType=NVARCHAR} where ID = #{ID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ID, StationID, DeviceName, DeviceType, IP, Port, Channel, ServerPort, UserName, UserPassword, nChannelID from CameraEquipment where ID = #{ID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
